event.description: {CovLStrv2{{t{Passing the value {0} to a weakly configured XML parser. }{{code{"xxe.xml"}}}}{t{ An attacker-controlled DTD may include external entity URLs, and the resolution of external entities may expose sensitive data or result in unwanted server requests. Processing an attacker-controlled DTD may also result in an overwhelming number of entity expansions, causing denial of service.}}}}

{CovLStrv2{{t{The recommended and strongest prevention against both external entity and entity expansion attacks is to disable DTD processing in the parser.}}{t{ Set the XML parser configuration to disable DTD processing.}}}}
